scripts.build:stencil: pnpm build:headless && pnpm build:icons && pnpm -C packages/stencil-library build
scripts.build:angular: pnpm -C apps/angular-workspace ng build angular-components && pnpm -C apps/angular-workspace ng build demo-app
scripts.build:all: pnpm build:stencil && pnpm build:motion && pnpm build:layout && pnpm build:angular
scripts.start:demo:dev: pnpm clean:angular && concurrently "pnpm run build:stencil --watch" "pnpm -C apps/angular-workspace start"
scripts.start:demo: pnpm build:stencil && pnpm build:motion && pnpm build:layout && pnpm clean:angular && pnpm -C apps/angular-workspace start
scripts.start:astro:dev: pnpm build:stencil && pnpm build:motion && pnpm -C apps/astro-landing dev
scripts.build:astro: pnpm build:stencil && pnpm build:motion && pnpm build:layout && pnpm -C apps/astro-landing build
scripts.deploy:cloudflare: pnpm build:all && pnpm -C apps/angular-workspace exec wrangler pages deploy
scripts.deploy:cloudflare:actions: pnpm build:all && npx wrangler pages deploy apps/angular-workspace/dist/demo-app/browser --project-name=and-web-components-demo
scripts.deploy:landing: pnpm build:astro && pnpm -C apps/astro-landing exec wrangler pages deploy
scripts.deploy:landing:actions: pnpm build:astro && npx wrangler pages deploy apps/astro-landing/dist --project-name=and-web-components-landing
scripts.publish:libs: pnpm build:stencil && pnpm build:motion && pnpm build:layout && lerna publish
